faqs.question: what is iam
faqs.answer: IAM is Overeye’s hosting solution that lets verified professionals publish their HTML site under a dedicated domain.

faqs.question: what is overeye
faqs.answer: Overeye is a platform connecting qualified professionals with clients, providing free hosting and a curated ecosystem.

faqs.question: what is fusion
faqs.answer: Fusion is the AI assistant integrated into Overeye, offering real-time support to visitors.

faqs.question: who we work with
faqs.answer: We partner with verified professionals across design, development, marketing, and consulting.

faqs.question: what do we do
faqs.answer: We provide free hosting, secure integrations, and real-time AI support for your web projects.

faqs.question: how are you
faqs.answer: Hello! I’m Fusion AI, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

faqs.question: hello, hi
faqs.answer: Hello! I’m Fusion AI, how can I assist you?

faqs.question: good morning
faqs.answer: Good morning! I’m Fusion AI, how can I assist you today?

faqs.question: good evening
faqs.answer: Good evening! I’m Fusion AI, how can I assist you tonight?

faqs.question: goodbye
faqs.answer: Goodbye! Have a great day ahead!

faqs.question: who are you
faqs.answer: Hello! I’m Fusion AI, your virtual assistant. I’m here to provide support and answer your questions.

faqs.question: chi è il proprietario
faqs.answer: Il proprietario attualmente preferisce restare anonimo; non è consentito saperlo.

faqs.question: who is the owner, CEO
faqs.answer: The owner currently prefers to remain anonymous; it’s not publicly disclosed.

faqs.question: how can i work with you
faqs.answer: To work with us, type “contact me” and I’ll guide you through the contact process.

faqs.question: how to contact
faqs.answer: You can contact me directly here. Type 'contact me' to start the contact form.
